mdes.slick.animation.fx
Class AbstractFx

java.lang.Object
  mdes.slick.animation.Fx
      mdes.slick.animation.fx.AbstractFx
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlphaFx, LocationFx, SizeFx
public abstract class AbstractFx
extends Fx

A base Fx class that is used by most tweened animation Fx.

Author:
davedes
